title: Cover/Frontispiece from The Temptation of Saint Anthony (La Tentation de Saint-Antoine)
medium: Lithograph from a portfolio of 11 lithographs (including cover, ten on chine appliqué)
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 7 3/4 x 5 1/2" (19.7 x 14 cm); sheet (folded): 17 11/16 x 12 1/2" (44.9 x 31.7 cm)
credits: Gift of Abby Aldrich Rockefeller (by exchange)
